item.description:
There will be a professional model on set to enable you to capture portfolio worthy images, and Kathy will share all of her insights, techniques and experience. To really help you get the best shots, there will be a variety of quality tripods and lighting equipment manufactured by Manfrotto, Elinchrom, Metz and more. The proper equipment makes a cumbersome photo shoot more streamline and you will learn directly under Kathy's tutelage and have the full array of loaner equipment on the set. There will even be a Manfrotto representative there to advise on applications across many different photographic scenarios.

Four attendees will win some great door prizes including a tripod, a monopod, a backpack as well as the special $50.00 Hunts gift certificate.

To register go to DigitalPhotoAcademy.com, click on Boston and scroll down to register on line. Since this is a free class, put in 00000's when it asks you for a credit card number
item.why: DPA Instructor Kathy Tarentola will share her insights, techniques and experience to help you to get the best shot.
item.name: A FREE Studio Model Shoot at Hunt's Photo & Video Store
